about_the_game:
The Royale All Champions Pack unlocks all of the current and future Champions featured in Battlerite Royale.

If you have previously purchased Champions in-game with Diamonds or Battle Coins, you will be reimbursed the respective currency you spent. The amount reimbursed is determined by the price of the Champion at the current time of reimbursement. Champions received through promotions, giveaways, or chests are not eligible for reimbursement.
detailed_description:
The Royale All Champions Pack unlocks all of the current and future Champions featured in Battlerite Royale.

If you have previously purchased Champions in-game with Diamonds or Battle Coins, you will be reimbursed the respective currency you spent. The amount reimbursed is determined by the price of the Champion at the current time of reimbursement. Champions received through promotions, giveaways, or chests are not eligible for reimbursement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
